verses.kjv: The word which came unto Jeremiah from the LORD in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, saying,
verses.web: The word which came to Jeremiah from LORD in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, saying,
verses.ct: During the reign of King Jehoiakim son of Josiah over Judah, the LORD gave this message to Jeremiah:

verses.kjv: Go unto the house of the Rechabites, and speak unto them, and bring them into the house of the LORD, into one of the chambers, and give them wine to drink.
verses.web: “Go to the house of the Rechabites, and speak to them, and bring them into LORD’s house, into one of the rooms, and give them wine to drink.”
verses.ct: "Go to the Rechabite family and speak with them. Bring them into one of the rooms in the LORD's house and offer them wine to drink."

verses.kjv: Then I took Jaazaniah the son of Jeremiah, the son of Habaziniah, and his brethren, and all his sons, and the whole house of the Rechabites;
verses.web: Then I took Jaazaniah the son of Jeremiah, the son of Habazziniah, with his brothers, all his sons, and the whole house of the Rechabites;
verses.ct: So I went and gathered Jaazaniah son of Jeremiah, the son of Habaziniah, along with his brothers, all his sons, and the entire Rechabite family.

verses.kjv: And I brought them into the house of the LORD, into the chamber of the sons of Hanan, the son of Igdaliah, a man of God, which was by the chamber of the princes, which was above the chamber of Maaseiah the son of Shallum, the keeper of the door:
verses.web: and I brought them into LORD’s house, into the room of the sons of Hanan the son of Igdaliah, the man of God, which was by the room of the princes, which was above the room of Maaseiah the son of Shallum, the keeper of the threshold.
verses.ct: I brought them into the LORD's house, to the room belonging to the sons of Hanan son of Igdaliah, a man of God. This room was next to the room used by the officials and above the room of Maaseiah son of Shallum, the keeper of the door.

verses.kjv: And I set before the sons of the house of the Rechabites pots full of wine, and cups, and I said unto them, Drink ye wine.
verses.web: I set before the sons of the house of the Rechabites bowls full of wine, and cups; and I said to them, “Drink wine!”
verses.ct: I set out bowls full of wine and cups in front of the Rechabites and said to them, "Go ahead — drink some wine."

verses.kjv: But they said, We will drink no wine: for Jonadab the son of Rechab our father commanded us, saying, Ye shall drink no wine, neither ye, nor your sons for ever:
verses.web: But they said, “We will drink no wine; for Jonadab the son of Rechab, our father, commanded us, saying, ‘You shall drink no wine, neither you, nor your sons, forever.
verses.ct: But they refused. "We don't drink wine," they said. "Our ancestor Jonadab son of Rechab gave us a command: 'You and your descendants must never drink wine.

verses.kjv: Neither shall ye build house, nor sow seed, nor plant vineyard, nor have any: but all your days ye shall dwell in tents; that ye may live many days in the land where ye be strangers.
verses.web: You shall not build a house, sow seed, plant a vineyard, or have any; but all your days you shall dwell in tents, that you may live many days in the land in which you live as nomads.’
verses.ct: You must never build houses, plant crops, or grow vineyards. Instead, you must live in tents your whole lives, so that you may live long in the land where you are outsiders.'

verses.kjv: Thus have we obeyed the voice of Jonadab the son of Rechab our father in all that he hath charged us, to drink no wine all our days, we, our wives, our sons, nor our daughters;
verses.web: We have obeyed the voice of Jonadab the son of Rechab, our father, in all that he commanded us, to drink no wine all our days, we, our wives, our sons, or our daughters;
verses.ct: We have obeyed everything our ancestor Jonadab son of Rechab told us. None of us has ever drunk wine — not us, not our wives, not our sons, not our daughters.

verses.kjv: Nor to build houses for us to dwell in: neither have we vineyard, nor field, nor seed:
verses.web: and not to build houses for ourselves to dwell in. We have no vineyard, field, or seed;
verses.ct: We haven't built houses to live in, and we own no vineyards, no fields, and no crops.

verses.kjv: But we have dwelt in tents, and have obeyed, and done according to all that Jonadab our father commanded us.
verses.web: but we have lived in tents, and have obeyed, and done according to all that Jonadab our father commanded us.
verses.ct: We've lived in tents and followed every command our ancestor Jonadab gave us.

verses.kjv: But it came to pass, when Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon came up into the land, that we said, Come, and let us go to Jerusalem for fear of the army of the Chaldeans, and for fear of the army of the Syrians: so we dwell at Jerusalem.
verses.web: But when Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up into the land, we said, ‘Come! Let’s go to Jerusalem for fear of the army of the Chaldeans, and for fear of the army of the Syrians; so we will dwell at Jerusalem.’ ”
verses.ct: But when King Nebuchadrezzar of Babylon invaded the land, we said, 'Let's go to Jerusalem to escape the Chaldean and Syrian armies.' That's why we're living in Jerusalem now."

verses.kjv: Then came the word of the LORD unto Jeremiah, saying,
verses.web: Then LORD’s word came to Jeremiah, saying,
verses.ct: Then the LORD spoke to Jeremiah:

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Go and tell the men of Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem, Will ye not receive instruction to hearken to my words? saith the LORD.
verses.web: “LORD of Armies, the God of Israel, says: ‘Go and tell the men of Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem, “Will you not receive instruction to listen to my words?” says LORD.
verses.ct: "This is what the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, says: Go and tell the people of Judah and the residents of Jerusalem, 'Won't you ever learn to listen to what I say?' declares the LORD.

verses.kjv: The words of Jonadab the son of Rechab, that he commanded his sons not to drink wine, are performed; for unto this day they drink none, but obey their father’s commandment: notwithstanding I have spoken unto you, rising early and speaking; but ye hearkened not unto me.
verses.web: “The words of Jonadab the son of Rechab that he commanded his sons, not to drink wine, are performed; and to this day they drink none, for they obey their father’s commandment; but I have spoken to you, rising up early and speaking, and you have not listened to me.
verses.ct: "Jonadab son of Rechab commanded his descendants not to drink wine, and they have obeyed him to this day — not one of them has touched it, because they honor their ancestor's command. But I have spoken to you again and again, and you have refused to listen to me.

verses.kjv: I have sent also unto you all my servants the prophets, rising up early and sending them, saying, Return ye now every man from his evil way, and amend your doings, and go not after other gods to serve them, and ye shall dwell in the land which I have given to you and to your fathers: but ye have not inclined your ear, nor hearkened unto me.
verses.web: I have sent also to you all my servants the prophets, rising up early and sending them, saying, ‘Every one of you must return now from his evil way, amend your doings, and don’t go after other gods to serve them, then you will dwell in the land which I have given to you and to your fathers:’ but you have not inclined your ear, nor listened to me.
verses.ct: I sent all my servants the prophets to you, time after time, with this message: 'Each of you must turn from your evil ways. Change how you live. Stop chasing after other gods and serving them. If you do, you will stay in the land I gave to you and your ancestors.' But you wouldn't pay attention. You refused to listen to me.

verses.kjv: Because the sons of Jonadab the son of Rechab have performed the commandment of their father, which he commanded them; but this people hath not hearkened unto me:
verses.web: The sons of Jonadab the son of Rechab have performed the commandment of their father which he commanded them, but this people has not listened to me.” ’
verses.ct: The descendants of Jonadab son of Rechab have faithfully kept every command their ancestor gave them, but my own people will not listen to me."

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the LORD God of hosts, the God of Israel; Behold, I will bring upon Judah and upon all the inhabitants of Jerusalem all the evil that I have pronounced against them: because I have spoken unto them, but they have not heard; and I have called unto them, but they have not answered.
verses.web: “Therefore LORD, the God of Armies, the God of Israel, says: ‘Behold, I will bring on Judah and on all the inhabitants of Jerusalem all the evil that I have pronounced against them; because I have spoken to them, but they have not heard; and I have called to them, but they have not answered.’ ”
verses.ct: "So this is what the LORD God of hosts, the God of Israel, says: 'I am going to bring down on Judah and on everyone living in Jerusalem every disaster I warned them about — because I spoke to them and they didn't listen, I called out to them and they didn't answer.'"

verses.kjv: And Jeremiah said unto the house of the Rechabites, Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Because ye have obeyed the commandment of Jonadab your father, and kept all his precepts, and done according unto all that he hath commanded you:
verses.web: Jeremiah said to the house of the Rechabites, “LORD of Armies, the God of Israel, says: ‘Because you have obeyed the commandment of Jonadab your father, and kept all his precepts, and done according to all that he commanded you;’
verses.ct: Then Jeremiah turned to the Rechabites and said, "This is what the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, says: 'Because you have obeyed the commands of your ancestor Jonadab, kept all his instructions, and done everything he told you to do —

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Jonadab the son of Rechab shall not want a man to stand before me for ever.
verses.web: therefore LORD of Armies, the God of Israel, says: ‘Jonadab the son of Rechab will not lack a man to stand before me forever.’ ”
verses.ct: the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, declares this promise: Jonadab son of Rechab will always have descendants who serve in my presence. His family line will never die out.'"
